product_name: The North Face Grizzly Pack Jacket - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Inspired by real bear fur, Polartec Thermal Pro Grizzly high-loft fleece gives The North Face men's Grizzly Pack Jacket an exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio for backcountry adventures.
